title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 28-1.2 - Information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 28-1.2 - Information

State Regulations

All information indicating that an applicant has been
convicted of a crime, or has committed an act which raises a reasonable
question as to the applicant's moral character, shall be referred to the
director of the Office of Professional Discipline or his or her
designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
28-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
